name: What Brought Us Here
description:
• The game contains spoilers!
  • Just one ending
  • More than ten different expressions for characters
  • Original assets (backgrounds, sprites, items)
  • Some sound effects
  • CG Gallery (5 full colored CGs)
  • English language
  • Windows/MacOS/Android

Credits:

Illustrator:

louiselapucelle (sprites, CGs, writing, programming)

Music:

On the Road Looking At Your Feet by Monplaisir

Mystic Harp Music - Dancers in the Fire

Sincere Love by Monplaisir

Red Hair Blue Sky by Monplaisir

They Way by WoWa Musik

Passion by Sappheiros

First by Monplaisir

Thank you so much for your support!

We're sorry that this is such a short game, we didn't have enough time to make everything we wanted in just nine days but we hope with all our hearts that you like it. Special thanks to all my followers on hananeneheaven from and to Daikon, Trish and Rizza for your love and kindness. 

And as always, thank you so much Little Sunflower.

Please send any bug reports to louiselapucelle@outlook.com and remember to support AidaIro's work!

Happy Tanabata's! We hope all your wishes come true this year.

-Lou
